languages.text: "Они поют? Удивительно, что ваша раса дошла до столь гармоничной формы взаимодействия с рукотворными инструментами. Мои сородичи также используют психоакустические гармоники, чтобы направлять наши творения. Я не являюсь костопевцем, но, возможно, могла бы подсказать определенные... принципы звучания вселенной твоим слугам".

"They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."
languages.original_text: "Они поют? Удивительно, что ваша раса дошла до столь гармоничной формы взаимодействия с рукотворными инструментами. Мои сородичи также используют психоакустические гармоники, чтобы направлять наши творения. Я не являюсь костопевцем, но, возможно, могла бы подсказать определенные... принципы звучания вселенной твоим слугам".

traits.locale_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race had reached such a harmonious form of interaction with the man-made tools. My kinsmen also use the psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of the certain... principles of how the universe sounds."

My kinsmen also use the psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of the certain... principles of how the universe sounds."

I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

languages.text: “他们是在唱歌吗？真令人惊讶，你的种族居然能与工具实现如此和谐的互动。我的族人也会通过灵能传声琴来指导我们的创作。我自己并不是吟骨者，但或许，我可以告诉你的仆人们某些……用来定义宇宙之声的准则。”
languages.original_text: "They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

traits.locale_text: “他们是在唱歌吗？真令人惊讶，你的种族居然能与工具实现如此和谐的互动。我的族人也会通过灵能传声琴来指导我们的创作。我自己并不是吟骨者，但或许，我可以告诉你的仆人们某些……用来定义宇宙之声的准则。”
“他们是在唱歌吗？真令人惊讶，你的种族居然能与人造工具实现如此和谐的互动。我的族人也会通过灵能传声琴来指导我们的创作。我自己并不是吟骨者，但或许，我可以告诉你的仆人们某些……关于宇宙之声的原理。”

languages.text: «¿Están cantando? Es sorprendente que tu raza sea capaz de lograr una forma tan armoniosa de interacción con herramientas artificiales. Los míos también utilizan armonías psicoacústicas para guiar nuestras creaciones. No soy una Aeda Ósea, pero podría educar a tus sirvientes sobre ciertos... principios que definen el sonido del universo».
languages.original_text: "They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

traits.locale_text: «¿Están cantando? Es sorprendente que tu raza sea capaz de lograr una forma tan armoniosa de interacción con herramientas artificiales. Los míos también utilizan armonías psicoacústicas para guiar nuestras creaciones. No soy una Aeda Ósea, pero podría educar a tus sirvientes sobre ciertos... principios que definen el sonido del universo».

languages.text: 「彼らは歌っているのでしょうか？あなた方の種族が、人工の道具を使ってこのような調和のとれた相互作用を達成できるとは、驚くべきことです。私の親族も、超能力音響ハーモニカを使って創作を指導していますよ。私自身はボーンシンガーではありませんが、宇宙の音に関するある種の...原理なら、あなたの従者にお伝えすることができそうです」
languages.original_text: "They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは歌っているのでしょうか？あなた方の種族が、人工の道具を使ってこのような調和のとれた相互作用を達成できるとは、驚くべきことです。私の親族も、超能力音響ハーモニカを使って創作を指導していますよ。私自身はボーンシンガーではありませんが、宇宙の音に関するある種の...原理なら、あなたの従者にお伝えすることができそうです」
「彼らは歌っているのでしょうか？あなた方の種族が、人工の道具を使ってこのような調和のとれた相互作用を達成できるとは、驚くべきことです。私の親族も、超能力音響ハーモニカを使って創作を指導していますよ。私自身はボーンシンガーではありませんが、宇宙の音に関するある種の...原理なら、あなたの従者にお伝えすることができそうです」

languages.text: « Sont-ils en train de chanter ? Je m'étonne que votre race soit parvenue à une forme d'interaction si harmonieuse avec des outils fabriqués. Mes semblables emploient également des harmonicas psychoacoustiques pour guider nos processus créatifs. Je ne maîtrise pas l'art des Chanteurs de Moelle, mais je pourrais peut-être exposer à vos serviteurs certains des... principes qui régissent les sons de l'univers. »
languages.original_text: "They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

traits.locale_text: « Sont-ils en train de chanter ? Je m'étonne que votre race soit parvenue à une forme d'interaction si harmonieuse avec des outils fabriqués. Mes semblables emploient également des harmonicas psychoacoustiques pour guider nos processus créatifs. Je ne maîtrise pas l'art des Chanteurs de Moelle, mais je pourrais peut-être exposer à vos serviteurs certains des... principes qui régissent les sons de l'univers. »

languages.text: "Sie singen? Es überrascht mich, dass Eure Spezies mit künstlichen Werkzeugen in der Lage war, eine so harmonische Form der Interaktion zu erreichen. Auch mein Volk setzt psycho-akustische Harmonien ein, um unsere Schöpfungen zu lenken. Ich selbst bin keine Knochensängerin, kann Euren Dienern aber vielleicht gewisse ... Prinzipien lehren, die den Klang des Universums definieren."
languages.original_text: "They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Sie singen? Es überrascht mich, dass Eure Spezies mit künstlichen Werkzeugen in der Lage war, eine so harmonische Form der Interaktion zu erreichen. Auch mein Volk setzt psycho-akustische Harmonien ein, um unsere Schöpfungen zu lenken. Ich selbst bin keine Knochensängerin, kann Euren Dienern aber vielleicht gewisse ... Prinzipien lehren, die den Klang des Universums definieren."

"Singen sie? Es überrascht mich, dass Eure Spezies mit menschengemachten Werkzeugen in der Lage war, eine solch harmonische Form der Interaktion zu erreichen. Meine Verwandten setzen ebenfalls psycho-akustische Harmonikas ein, um unsere Schöpfungen zu führen. Ich selbst bin keine Knochensängerin, doch ich kann Euren Dienern vielleicht gewisse ... Prinzipien näherbringen, wie das Universum klingt."

languages.text: "Şarkı mı söylüyorlarmış? Irkınızın beşerî aletler kullanarak böylesi ahenkli bir etkileşim biçimine ulaşabilmesi şaşırtıcı. Biz de mahlukatlarımıza rehberlik etmek için ruhsezi yankıları yayan ezgiler kullanırız. Ben Kemikokuyan değilim ama hizmetkârlarına, evrenin seslerini meydana çıkaran temel ilkelerden bahsedebilirim."
languages.original_text: "They are singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with crafted tools. My kinsmen, too, use psycho-acoustic harmonics to guide our creations. I am not a Bonesinger myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles that define the sound of the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Şarkı mı söylüyorlarmış? Irkınızın beşerî aletler kullanarak böylesi ahenkli bir etkileşim biçimine ulaşabilmesi şaşırtıcı. Biz de mahlukatlarımıza rehberlik etmek için ruhsezi yankıları yayan ezgiler kullanırız. Ben Kemikokuyan değilim ama hizmetkârlarına, evrenin seslerini meydana çıkaran temel ilkelerden bahsedebilirim."
